item.description:
Let's try for a movie on July 4th weekend. How about "My Sister's Keeper"? Nothing like a tear-jerker drama to pick up our spirits on a holiday weekend.

The Plot (from imdb.com): Anna Fitzgerald (Abigail Breslin) looks to earn medical emancipation from her parents (Cameron Diaz and Jason Patric) who until now have relied on their youngest child to help their leukemia-stricken daughter Kate (Sofia Vassilieva) remain alive.

The movie is playing at Blackstone Valley at 4:45 PM on Sunday, July 5. Let's plan on meeting at about 4:25. Afterwards, anyone who wants to can go out for dinner.
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the guy with glasses, goatee, and Superman cap

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: My Sister's Keeper - Meet at 4:25 at Blackstone Valley
